name: Constraints
desc: Client-originated limitations on how to process a request, such as including explicit content and how much content the client device can receive in a response.

items.name: allowExplicitContent
items.desc: An indicator of whether it’s OK for your service to provide explicit content.

items.name: maximumQueueSegmentItemCount
items.desc: The maximum number of pieces to provide in a Queue.

items.name: updateUserTasteProfile
items.desc: An indicator of whether to use these interactions to update your service’s model of the user’s likes and dislikes.
